graph_title: Coverage by protected areas of important sites for mountain biodiversity
nazwa_wskaznika: 15.4.1 Coverage by protected areas of important sites for mountain biodiversity
zadanie: 15.4 By 2030, ensure the conservation of mountain ecosystems, including their biodiversity, in order to enhance their capacity to provide benefits that are essential for sustainable development
uwagi: Proxy indicator, available within the Polish public statistics.An original indicator, adopted by the UN for monitoring target 15.4 is 15.4.1 Coverage by protected areas of important sites for mountain biodiversity.
